entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Murdochville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:21 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 18 with temperature rising to minus 12 by morning. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.summary: Snow. High minus 6. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
